message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.CV 

The paper deals with improving the performance of Hierarchical Classification (HC) using a data-driven filter-based approach. HC is a subfield of machine learning and falls under the category of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses the use of clustering techniques, which is a common method in Information Retrieval (cs.IR) and Natural Language Processing (cs.CL). The proposed approach involves modifying the hierarchical structure, which is a common problem in Large Scale Machine Learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the use of features, which is a common topic in Computer Vision (cs.CV). Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG, followed by cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.AI, and cs.CV.
